text: Pietro Badoglio, 1st Duke of Addis Abeba, 1st Marquess of Sabotino (28 September 1871 â€“ 1 November 1956), was an Italian general during both World Wars and the first viceroy of Italian East Africa. With the fall of the Fascist regime in Italy, he became Prime Minister of Italy. ==References== Category:1871 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Italy
title: Pietro Badoglio
